name: squashy bug (itch)
description:
Squash bugs! The more, the better! Be the best squasher in the world! Controls: ButtonControlClickStompARotate Left
DRotate Right
MMute / Unmute Audio

Created in November 2021 for the Game Off 2021 Jam by Barry Lawnmower and Pet Pumpkin

Made with:
- Unity
- Blender
- Ableton Live

Packages Used:
- Bezier Path Creator
- Text Animator
- DOTween Pro
- Ultimate Sound FX Bundle

With some sound effects from: https://freesound.org/

You can check out the mess on Github
